page.title: 18THE VILLAGE PLAYING FIELDS
page.content: The playing fields are controlled by{a {trust}and run by a committee which represents the different groups in the village. Sited in the{centre of the village next to the Coronation Hall,they provide a{safe place}for children to play.As the school is built on a restricted site,the children use the fields for their games lessons throughout the year. There are{swings}and a{see_saw}for the younger children and groups of people organise cricket and football matches for the local community. Funds have to be raised for the maintenance of the playing fields and this usually consists of one grand event in the autumn.
